alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:06AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Glenmora. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, When the river is rising and forecast to reach 16 feet, portions of Highway 112 between Highway 121 and Beechwood Church is subject to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 16.0 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Calcasieu River Glenmora 12.0 6.0 Wed 8 am CST 12.7 14.5 15.4 &&
